alert.note: Alert for Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT LEBANON COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Annville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pleasant Hill around 250 PM EDT. Lebanon, Cornwall and Sand Hill around 255 PM EDT. Avon around 300 PM EDT. Myerstown and Schaefferstown around 305 PM EDT. Richland and Kleinfeltersville around 310 PM EDT. Newmanstown around 315 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Avon Heights, Ono and Jonestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
